biotools.summary:
IMGT/mAb-DB is the IMGT® database for monoclonal antibodies (mAb) or immunoglobulins (IG), fusion proteins for immune applications (FPIA) and composite proteins for clinical applications (CPCA).
IMGT/mAb-DB provides links to IMGT/2Dstructure-DB and IMGT/3Dstructure-DB.

bioschemas.name: IMGT mAb-DB
